channel.title: How do you change the shops and items they sell?
channel.description:
EXAMPLE:
shop = 1 Varrock_General_Store 1 1 1931 5 1935 2 1735 2 1925 3 1923 2 1887 2 590 2 1755 2 2347 5 550 5
What do the numbers stand for? ItemID's? And how would I go about adding a new shop, or just changing the "Varrock General Store NPC" to a different NPC?
Any help would be greatly appreciated. [br][size=1]Posted at: March 27, 2006, 02:52:42 pm[/size][hr]And if this is not in the right forum, sorry... :)

item.title: How do you change the shops and items they sell?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

That post was made three years ago… I assume they figured it out by now.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the shops and items they sell?

item.title: How do you change the shops and items they sell?
item.dc:creator: @starting_coder starting coder
item.description:
@starting_coder wrote:

okay Ill translate this for you. Cause I did this myself :] Go to client.java Press control f and type in - [code]WanneShop = 38
This is a robe seller and no1 cares about robes
You’ll find this

} else if (NPCID == 1039) { // robe seller PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 38;
So is Id is 1039.
His shop = 38

now go to
Source folder > Config > Shops — Find shop = 38

shop = 38	Robe_Store		2	2	2894	500	2914	500	2924	500	2934	500	2896	500	2906	500	2916	500	2926	500	2936	500	2908	500	2918	500	2928	500	2938	500	2900	500	2910	500	2920	500	2930	500	2940	500	2902	500	2912	500	2922	500	2932	500	2942	500

The shop = 38 just tells you the id of shop - The robe_store - is the name of the store.
You can edit that to ummn lets say : Test_Shop :
So now if you have the guy that is set for shop 38 - you’ll trade him and his shop name will be - Test Shop -
Now the first numbers 2 and 2 are if you can buy and sell - Just leave those both 2 - 2
Means you are aloud to buy and sell to shop kk…
After that you get a jumble of numbers
Start number is — 2894 500 - The 2894 is the id of the item - the - 500 - is how many of that item the shop has instock.

If you do not care about the shop
then delete all the items so it looks like this
shop = 38 Robe_Store 2 2
There isn’t any items that the store sells.
What you do now is find the item Id of your items you want it to sell
lets start with 4151 - Thats a whip - and lets have them sell - 10 - in stock…
It will be now

shop = 38	Robe_Store		2	2	4151	10

So just contine - and press tab each time.
[ITEM ID]-TAB-[AMOUNT]-TAB-[ITEM ID]-TAB-[AMOUNT]----ECETERA…
And thats done :]

If you have further questions: I might be able to help - Just email me at purplehippokid_7_@hotmail.com – Tell me who you are… what you want… and remind me about this topic kk thanks :} Hope this helped ^_^[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: How do you change the shops and items they sell?
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

To add a new shop just do what whitefang has done with the default shops, and make it so if you first click a certain npc id it’ll do wanneshop = shop id here and your shop id will be defined in shops.cfg, hope that helped.

Read full topic
